findings.title: uint overflow may lead to stealing funds
findings.description: possible to create a delegation with a huge amount which can result in critically bad malicious usages

findings.title: Holders can burn locked funds
findings.description: holders can "burn" locked tokens resulting in unpredictable behavior

findings.title: Node can unlink validator
findings.description: nodes can remove validator's address from the _validatorAddressToId list and take over full control over validator

findings.title: Unlocking funds after slashing
findings.description: initially locked funds will not be unlocked at the end of the delegation period if any portion of the funds are slashed

findings.title: Bounties and fees should only be locked for the first 3 months
findings.description: bounties are currently locked for the first 3 months after delegation instead of after the token launch

findings.title: getLockedCount is iterating over all history of delegations
findings.description: getLockedCount function may even change the state of these delegations by calling getState

findings.title: Tokens are unlocked only when delegation ends
findings.description: tokens are only unlocked if at least 50% of tokens that were bought on the initial launch are undelegated

findings.title: Tokens after delegation should not be unlocked automatically
findings.description: these tokens should be added to _purchased as they were in that state before their delegation

findings.title: Some unlocked tokens can become locked after delegation is rejected
findings.description: the initial status of tokens gets stored and itâ€™s either completely locked or unlocked

findings.title: Gas limit for bounty and slashing distribution
findings.description: Loops over all active delegators lead to huge gas costs.

findings.title: ERC-777 callback issue
findings.description: Reentrancy opportunities in ERC-777 token transfer callbacks.

findings.title: Rename functions
findings.description: Functions with misleading names can lead to confusion and state changes.

findings.title: Delegations might stuck in non-active validator
findings.description: Delegations may get stuck for up to 12 months if a validator doesn't meet minimum requirements.

findings.title: Disabled Validators still have delegated funds
findings.description: Disabled validators can still hold delegations, locking funds for up to 12 months.

findings.title: Fees can be > 100%
findings.description: Validators can be created with fee rates above 100%.

findings.title: getState changes state implicitly
findings.description: getState function changes state implicitly, breaking functionality.

findings.title: _endingDelegations list is redundant
findings.description: The list is only used in getPurchasedAmount function and can be optimized.

findings.title: Some functions are defined but not implemented
findings.description: Functions with no implementation can lead to errors and reduce readability.

findings.title: tokenState.setState redundant checks
findings.description: Complex if/else statements can be simplified for gas optimization and readability.

findings.title: Validator should be able to remove delegator
findings.description: Validators should be able to undelegate delegators for consistency.

findings.title: Events not emitted in some cases
findings.description: Events are not emitted for every state change, making it hard to track system changes.

findings.title: DelegationService redundancy
findings.description: The contract adds complexity and gas costs due to extra calls between contracts.

findings.title: Rounding errors after slashing
findings.description: Rounding errors occur when slashing happens, causing different values to have different rounding errors, which can lead to uint underflow or smaller values.

findings.title: Slashes do not affect bounty distribution
findings.description: When slashes are processed by a holder, _effectiveDelegatedByHolderToValidator value is not reduced, affecting the bounty distribution.

findings.title: Iterations over slashes
findings.description: Iterating over slashes can be gas-inefficient and may cause system halt if there are a lot of slashes.

findings.title: Storage operations optimization
findings.description: Optimizations for storage operations to avoid unnecessary writes.

findings.title: Duplicate function implementation addMonths()
findings.description: Redundant implementation of TimeHelpers.addMonths() function.

findings.title: Function overloading
findings.description: Overloaded functions in DelegationController, making code less readable and increasing the probability of missing bugs.
